name: SCRIPT and STYLE and CUSTOM full detection
description: This description is the detect-test. It is designed to detect isolated or non-nested elements in thier enitrety. OPEN to CLOSE, selecting any false OPENS within. (Thus, it is not designed to work alone, with nesting. That is another whole area of detection beyond the scope of a single regex.)ssf<test>kfj</test>dsfsfj<test slk="sds">dff</test>dkilkf<test slj="DFt/dff">jfj</test>lkilkj<test djl="kjf/dlj" kkj />fflljl<test></test>dsfsis<test />fkifsf<test /><test></test>ewrsfs<test/><test/test>lds (Expected FAIL)Odd formats, still valid.bsd<test /test>dkjdfs<test//test>jdf (Expected to fail)dfs<test></test>dsjfsf<test/>dfjffd<test>code<<>><</>//><test</test>dfdffd<test>code>>/test>><test/>dfdfsffds<test <test /test / < test/ /test /test/ />dflfds<test <test /test / < test/ /test /test/ /test>dfdfds<test <test /test / < test/ /test /test/ </test>dff
